Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed at Polk
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are standing at Polk due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are standing at Polk due to signal problems. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#21 Cermak

#9 Ashland

Shuttle buses have been requested to provided service between Ashland/Lake to 54th/Cermak

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
